entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 7:57 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:57 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
